name: Pay Slip Report
query:
SELECT
    ss.name AS "Salary Slip",
    ss.employee AS "Employee ID",
    ss.employee_name AS "Employee Name",
    ss.start_date AS "Start Date",
    ss.end_date AS "End Date",
    ss.payment_type AS "Payment Type",
    ss.gross_pay AS "Gross Pay",
    ss.total_deduction AS "Total Deduction",
    ss.net_pay AS "Net Pay",

    -- Flatten earnings
    IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(se.salary_component, ':', se.amount) SEPARATOR ', '), '') AS "Earnings",

    -- Flatten deductions
    IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(sd.salary_component, ':', sd.amount) SEPARATOR ', '), '') AS "Deductions"

FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss
LEFT JOIN `tabSalary Detail` se ON se.parent = ss.name AND se.parentfield = 'earnings'
LEFT JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd ON sd.parent = ss.name AND sd.parentfield = 'deductions'

WHERE ss.docstatus = 1
{% if company %}
AND ss.company = '{{ company }}'
{% endif %}
{% if from_date %}
AND ss.start_date >= '{{ from_date }}'
{% endif %}
{% if to_date %}
AND ss.end_date <= '{{ to_date }}'
{% endif %}

GROUP BY ss.name, ss.employee, ss.employee_name, ss.start_date, ss.end_date, ss.payment_type, ss.gross_pay, ss.total_deduction, ss.net_pay

ORDER BY ss.employee ASC, ss.start_date ASC
